content: I'll definitely keep you updated on how my muffins turn out. By the way, I made a batch of sugar-free banana muffins last week using stevia, and they were okay, but I think I need to adjust the ratio of stevia to sugar to get a better flavor. Speaking of sugar-free baking, have you got any tips on how to make a good sugar-free chocolate cake? I've been craving something rich and chocolatey lately.
